name: hrms-saas
description: Enterprise Multi-Tenant Human Resources Management System

scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && black --check . && isort --check-only . && flake8 . && mypy app/
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.security: npm run security:backend && npm run security:frontend
scripts.security:backend: cd backend && bandit -r app/ && safety check
scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && pip install -r requirements-test.txt
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python -m build
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:frontend: cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules dist coverage
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && alembic upgrade head
scripts.db:rollback: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && alembic downgrade -1
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && alembic downgrade base && alembic upgrade head
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run security
scripts.precommit: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run test:backend:coverage
